The House Planks.Description: Pâté & spiced fruit chutney – seared chicken breast & house curry cream – mince & spuds – chipotle & sweet chilli glazed ribs – chip shop fish & mushy peas – artisan bread & butter.

British Beef Cottage Pie.Description: Prime mince slowly braised down in real gravy – mash – Vimto red cabbage.

Chicken Schnitzel.Description: Flattened chicken, dusted with a herb crumb – fried potatoes & house coleslaw.

Fish and Chips.Description: Fresh beer battered fish – real chips – mushy peas & thick buttered white bread.
